definition: history/annals/title of an official historian in ancient China

sentences.english: Dr. Stevens has worked at the language institute since 1982.
sentences.chinese: 史蒂文斯从1982年起就一直在语言学院工作。

sentences.english: Stevenson wrote a book called Treasure Island.
sentences.chinese: 史蒂文森写了一部名叫《金银岛》的小说。

sentences.english: Treasure Island , which was written by Stevenson , is a popular book.
sentences.chinese: 《宝岛》是史蒂文森著的，是一本畅销书。

sentences.english: Come on.Steven's easy to work with.
sentences.chinese: 别紧张，与史蒂文一起工作很容易。

sentences.english: My name is Captain Colter Stevens.
sentences.chinese: 我的名字是队长科尔特史蒂文斯。

sentences.english: Stevens said that, but Frost could have said it, too.
sentences.chinese: 史蒂文斯说的这句，但是弗罗斯特也可以这样说。
史蒂文，我们需要个男演员。

sentences.english: Steven and Bill want to have a picture together and they intend to go to a photo studio.
sentences.chinese: 史蒂文和比尔想照张合影，他们打算去一家照相馆。

sentences.english: Stevenson got along well with Osbourne's children.
sentences.chinese: 史蒂文森相处良好奥斯本的儿童。

sentences.english: Adlai Stevenson also gave a powerful speech before the election.
sentences.chinese: 阿德莱史蒂文森还介绍了在大选前的强大的语音。

sentences.english: That all sounds a bit dodgy, Steven, a fake ID for me?
sentences.chinese: 这听上去很荒唐，史蒂文，我的假证？

sentences.english: It was not immediately clear whether the attacker knew Stevenson was a police detective.
sentences.chinese: 目前尚不清楚是否攻击者知道史蒂文森是一名警探。

sentences.english: He did not want them punished.
sentences.chinese: 史蒂文生不想那两人受到惩罚。

sentences.english: I have to go downstairs and see Steven.
sentences.chinese: 我得下楼去看史蒂文了。

sentences.english: Steven's watch has run down, so he goes to a watch shop to repair it.
sentences.chinese: 史蒂文的手表不走了，他去一家表店修理。

sentences.english: She and Steven were at the studio.

definition: Steven (name)/Simon Stevin (1548-1620), Flemish engineer and mathematician, played a key role in introducing the decimal system to Europe
Hofmann or Hoffman (name)/August Wilhelm von Hofmann (1818-1892), German chemist/Dustin Hoffman (1937-), US film actor
